official_title: Resolution expressing the sense of the House that optometric services be included in medical assistance programs.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that any legislation providing for the modification or federalization of medical assistance programs include optometric services. Urges the States to seek to include optometric services whether or not they are included in the offerings of primary health care.

titles.title: Resolution expressing the sense of the House that optometric services be included in medical assistance programs.
